title: Topple
content:

1d4+4Bludgeoning

Swipe at a creature to knock it Prone.

Melee DEX Save Attack Roll Short Rest

Topple is an Action in Baldur's Gate 3. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class and Equipment.
